name: querize
description: A query builder for SQL in Node.js

scripts.build:post1: node build.cjs --copy src/package.json.cjs dist/cjs/package.json && node build.cjs --copy src/index.cjs dist/cjs/index.cjs

scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:post1 && npm run build:post2
